title: Pak Armed Forces target Afghan Taliban, Khwarij terrorists hideouts in Afghanistan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 15 (APP):Pak Armed Forces carried out precision strikes on hideouts of Afghan Taliban and Khwarij terrorists located in Kandahar province and Kabul.
Video Playerhttps://www.app.com.pk/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/pak.mp400:0000:0000:00Use Up/Down Arrow keys to increase or decrease volume.
Security sources said that Pakistan Army targeted Afghan Talibanâ€™s Battalion No. 4 and Border Brigade No. 6 in Kandahar, which were completely destroyed. All targets were carefully selected, situated away from civilian areas, and successfully hit, they added.
Meanwhile, Pak Armed Forces also targeted the center and leadership of Fitna al-Hindustan in Kabul.
The Sources said that Pakistan Army is full capable to respond to any external aggression.
